publication.title: Classbased Detailed Routing in VLSI Design
publication.jconf: Cologne Twente Workshop on Graphs and Combinatorical Optimization

publication.title: Yield Improvement by Local Wiring Redundancy
publication.authors: jeanne bickford,jason hibbeler,markus bühler,jürgen koehl,dirk muller,sven peyer
publication.jconf: International Symposium on Quality Electronic Design
publication.abstract: Technology migration from 130 nm to 90 nm has resulted in increased yield loss caused by opens in wiring interconnects and vias. Sensitivity to these defects can be significantly reduced through the use of design methodologies that use arbitrary networks with high degrees of redundancy instead of trees for signal wires. In this paper we describe a technique that improves
